title: Sunflower Harvesting Machine   How to harvest and processing sunflower seeds

tasks.task: Performing physical tasks related to farming while singing 'London Bridge is Falling Down'
subtasks: Planting crops in the farm fields
Building farm structures with sticks and stones
Constructing farm buildings with wood and clay
Reinforcing farm facilities with steel and iron
Observing and tending to livestock (in this case, cows)
Checking farm lights (presumably for safety or security)

tasks.task: Performing physical tasks related to farming while singing 'London Bridge is Falling Down'**
